title: Discussion for Silvers above: Should divisions below Bronze Exist?
body:
Hello fellow champions, 

Do you think that adding a division below Bronze would allow for the termination of the Bronzodia Syndrome? Where I've seen there are good players but also like really bad players in that division, maybe Bronze would benefit from a division below instead of being automatically placed in Bronze V. 

I've also always wondered why toxic people don't have their own queue/games
In Dota2 you're placed in "Low Priority Queue" if you're reported/toxic
Where you have to play and complete 3 games playing with other toxic players in order to return to the normal population. I believe this would resolve the issues in league as well.
